endDate.description: Returns orders with order date before the specified date. UTC.
endDate.title: End Date

orderNumber.description: Returns a single order with the specified order number. If set, it overrides all other filters.
orderNumber.title: Order Number

customerId.description: Only returns orders for a specified Customer GUID. The CustomerId can be specified as a list of comma-separated GUIDs.
customerId.title: Customer ID

customerCode.description: Returns orders that start with the specific customer code
customerCode.title: Customer Code

startDate.description: Returns orders with order date after the specified date. UTC.
startDate.title: Start Date

modifiedSince.description: Returns orders created or edited after a specified date, must be UTC format
modifiedSince.title: Modified Since

warehouseName.description: Returns stock on hand for a specific warehouse name
warehouseName.title: Warehouse Name

orderBy.description: Orders the list by a specific column, by default the list is ordered by productCode
orderBy.title: Order By

warehouseCode.description: Returns stock on hand for a specific warehouse code
warehouseCode.title: Warehouse Code

modifiedSince.description: Returns stock on hand values modified after a specific date
modifiedSince.title: Modified Since

asAtDate.description: Returns the stock on hand for a specific date
asAtDate.title: As at Date

IsAssembled.description: Whether the AvailableQty will also include the quantity that can be assembled
IsAssembled.title: Is Assembled

productId.description: Returns products with the specific Product Guid. You can enter multiple product IDs separated by commas.
productId.title: Product ID

anyOf.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
anyOf.title: Return All

anyOf.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
anyOf.title: Return All

anyOf.description: Max number of results to return
anyOf.title: Limit

anyOf.description: Max number of results to return
anyOf.title: Limit
